overview:
Brian Craig has more than 21 years of industry experience at Microsoft, e-commerce pioneer eShop Inc., Sun Microsystems and IBM, and is a veteran of both Microsoft and Silicon Valley. He joined CWR Mobility BV in December, 2010 and is responsible for global marketing.

Craig has broad experience in hi-tech marketing, spanning both corporate and entrepreneurial startup environments. Craig was at Microsoft for 9 years where he worked in the U.S. subsidiary marketing organization as well as in business/product groups. Most recently, Craig was Director of U.S. Windows Server marketing; prior to that he led U.S. Exchange Server marketing.

Prior to that Craig worked at eShop Inc., an e-commerce startup in San Mateo, Ca. where he was Director of Strategic Partnerships and Senior Product Manager. Craig joined Microsoft when it acquired eShop in 1996.

Prior to that Craig worked at Sun Microsystems for seven years in various product and partner marketing capacities related to networking and distributed computing. He worked at IBM prior to that.

Brian Craig holds a Bachelor of Science degree from the University of California at Berkeley in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.
